responders.name: MailIncidentStatus
responders.description: Mail a detailed status information of an incident case. The mail is sent to recipients specified by tags prefixed with 'mail='. The responder respects tlp definitions. For tlp:amber mail addresse and for tlp:green mail domains must be pre-defined in the configuration. For tlp:red sending mails is denied. The responser also uses thehive4py to collect information about the status of the tasks of the incidents.
